Actions.ActionName: Path to your instruction audio file
Get the active action from Macrowhisper
Actions.Text:
# Store the current focused app by bundle ID
current_app_bundle=$(osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get bundle identifier of first application process whose frontmost is true')

# Open file in background
open -g -a "superwhisper" "$KMVAR_localRec"

# Activate the original app using bundle identifier
osascript -e "tell application id \"$current_app_bundle\" to activate"

$KMVAR_sw_mwPath --get-action

Actions.ActionName: If textChat is not active, we activate it
Execute Macro “MW MBar” (to update the insert action icon)
